title: No popup menu in Java editor ruler in Photon
description: There is a bug in Photon where the popup menu in the Java editor ruler does not appear.
OB: When a user opens a Java editor and right-clicks on the left vertical ruler, no menu pops up to add breakpoints/marks, etc.
EB: When a user opens a Java editor and right-clicks on the left vertical ruler, a menu should pop up to add breakpoints/marks, etc.
SR:
1) Open a Java editor.
2) Right-click on the left vertical ruler.
Expected: A menu should pop up to add breakpoints/marks, etc.
Actual: No menu pops up.
